content: Please come to the prize pile next to me for your bundles!
{西薇第1个二等奖数字} and {西薇第2个二等奖数字} are this round's lucky silver numbers! Congrats!
Hat-Trick Magic Wheel, spin to see what luck reveals! No? Oh, okay.
Lucky number lucky star! Fancy some milk tea? No? Oh, okay.
*slurp*...Shh! Quiet you. I'm just sneaking a sip. No one's here anyway.
The Magic Wheel's ready! Come spin and guess the lucky number!
Countdown to the Hat-Trick Magic Wheel! Feeling lucky yet?
No one got the gold number? Da-la~ Spin again next time!
Lucky bronze numbers this round: {西薇第1个三等奖数字}, {西薇第2个三等奖数字}, and {西薇第3个二等奖数字}! No match? Spin again!
Someone hit the gold number! Let's share the luck, everyone!
The lucky gold number this time is... "{西薇大奖数字}"! Da-lala~ Congratulations!
